name: Ultra Ping Pong
description: Futuristic cyberpunk Pong game with neon aesthetics. Challenge the AI in this retro-futuristic arcade experience. Score points by getting the ball past your opponent's paddle in this classic game reimagined with stunning neon visuals and smooth gameplay.
